patch:
@@ -41,6 +41,5 @@ target 'example' do
   pod 'Folly', :podspec => '../../node_modules/react-native/third-party-podspecs/Folly.podspec'
 
   pod 'lottie-react-native', :path => '../../'
-  pod 'lottie-ios', '~> 3.1.8'
 end

@@ -19,9 +19,7 @@ PODS:
     - DoubleConversion
     - glog
   - glog (0.3.5)
-  - lottie-ios (3.1.8)
   - lottie-react-native (3.4.0):
-    - lottie-ios (~> 3.1.8)
     - React
   - RCTRequired (0.62.2)
   - RCTTypeSafety (0.62.2):
@@ -253,7 +251,6 @@ DEPENDENCIES:
   - FBReactNativeSpec (from `../../node_modules/react-native/Libraries/FBReactNativeSpec`)
   - Folly (from `../../node_modules/react-native/third-party-podspecs/Folly.podspec`)
   - glog (from `../../node_modules/react-native/third-party-podspecs/glog.podspec`)
-  - lottie-ios (~> 3.1.8)
   - lottie-react-native (from `../../`)
   - RCTRequired (from `../../node_modules/react-native/Libraries/RCTRequired`)
   - RCTTypeSafety (from `../../node_modules/react-native/Libraries/TypeSafety`)
@@ -282,7 +279,6 @@ DEPENDENCIES:
 SPEC REPOS:
   https://github.com/CocoaPods/Specs.git:
     - boost-for-react-native
-    - lottie-ios
 
 EXTERNAL SOURCES:
   DoubleConversion:
@@ -345,7 +341,6 @@ SPEC CHECKSUMS:
   FBReactNativeSpec: 5465d51ccfeecb7faa12f9ae0024f2044ce4044e
   Folly: 30e7936e1c45c08d884aa59369ed951a8e68cf51
   glog: 1f3da668190260b06b429bb211bfbee5cd790c28
-  lottie-ios: 48fac6be217c76937e36e340e2d09cf7b10b7f5f
   lottie-react-native: 98dbce46eb4e71d5ac52ac44614c11918a64dacc
   RCTRequired: cec6a34b3ac8a9915c37e7e4ad3aa74726ce4035
   RCTTypeSafety: 93006131180074cffa227a1075802c89a49dd4ce

@@ -6,15 +6,20 @@ Pod::Spec.new do |s|
   s.name         = "lottie-react-native"
   s.version      = package['version']
   s.summary      = "Lottie component for React Native (iOS and Android)"
-
+  
   s.authors      = { "intelligibabble" => "leland.m.richardson@gmail.com" }
-  s.homepage     = "https://github.com/airbnb/lottie-react-native#readme"
+  s.homepage     = "https://github.com/Learnfield-GmbH/lottie-react-native.git#readme"
   s.license      = package['license']
   s.platform     = :ios, "9.0"
 
-  s.source       = { :git => "https://github.com/react-community/lottie-react-native.git", :tag => "v#{s.version}" }
+  s.source       = { :git => "https://github.com/Learnfield-GmbH/lottie-react-native.git", :tag => "v#{s.version}" }
   s.source_files  = "src/ios/**/*.{h,m,swift}"
   s.swift_version = "5.0"
   s.dependency 'React'
-  s.dependency 'lottie-ios', '~> 3.1.8'
+
+  s.pod_target_xcconfig = { 'OTHER_LDFLAGS' => '$(inherited) -framework Lottie',
+                            'FRAMEWORK_SEARCH_PATHS[sdk=iphoneos*]' => '$(inherited) ../../ios/Submodules/Wynton/Submodules/Dependencies/Frameworks/XCode12.4/Lottie.xcframework/ios-arm64_armv7',
+                            'FRAMEWORK_SEARCH_PATHS[sdk=iphonesimulator*]' => '$(inherited) ../../ios/Submodules/Wynton/Submodules/Dependencies/Frameworks/XCode12.4/Lottie.xcframework/ios-arm64_i386_x86_64-simulator'
+                           }
+
 end

@@ -4427,11 +4427,6 @@ loose-envify@^1.0.0, loose-envify@^1.1.0, loose-envify@^1.3.1, loose-envify@^1.4
   dependencies:
     js-tokens "^3.0.0 || ^4.0.0"
